DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate total residual spherical aberration ( TSA ) post-IOL implantation , determine association exists TSA , postoperative high order aberration ( HOA ) , functional vision follow IOL implantation patient group pre-operative corneal spherical aberration ( CSA ) .
DOC.brief_title: An Assessment Residual Spherical Aberration , Postoperative Total High Order Aberrations , Functional Vision Correlation Following Intraocular Lens ( IOL ) Implantation
DOC.detailed_description: Patients group pre-operative corneal spherical aberration ( CSA ) measure , i.e. , ≤0.230 micron ≥0.270 micron .
DOC.criteria: Agerelated cataract grade 3 low least one eye ; Planned cataract removal via phacoemulsification implantation aspheric IOL ; Able operation within 30 day preoperative evaluation ; Good ocular health , exception cataract ; ≤ 1.50 diopter ( D ) preoperative astigmatism keratometry ; Willing able understand sign inform consent ; Willing able attend postoperative examination per protocol schedule ; Able achieve 6.5mm dilated pupil ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Preoperative ocular pathology specify protocol ; Preoperative corneal pathology specify protocol ; Keratometric astigmatism exceed 1.50 diopter ; Planned postoperative refraction monovision ; Uncontrolled diabetes ; Use systemic topical drug know interfere visual performance ; Contact lens use active treatment portion trial ; Any concurrent infectious/non infectious conjunctivitis , keratitis uveitis ; Any clinically significant , serious severe medical psychiatric condition may increase risk associate study participation study device implantation may interfere interpretation study result ; Participation ( current participation ) investigational drug device trial within previous 30 day prior start date trial ; Intraocular conventional surgery within past three month intraocular laser surgery within one month operate eye ; Pregnant nursing mother females childbearing potential practicing reliable medically acceptable method birth control ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
